mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LESSON_LIST VALUES( seq_lesson_list.nextval, 1, 1, #{lesson_subj}, sysdate, #{lesson_type}, #{lesson_price}, #{lesson_thumbnail}, #{lesson_short_cont}, 'haha', #{lesson_kit} )
mapper.select: SELECT LESSON_LIST.LESSON_SUBJ, LESSON_LIST.LESSON_THUMBNAIL, LESSON_LIST.LESSON_SHORT_CONT, TEACHER.T_NAME FROM LESSON_LIST, TEACHER WHERE T_NAME='두껍'
mapper.update: UPDATE LESSON_LIST SET LESSON_SUBJ=#{lesson_subj}, LESSON_TYPE=#{lesson_type}, LESSON_PRICE=#{lesson_price}, LESSON_THUMBNAIL=#{lesson_thumbnail}, LESSON_SHORT_CONT=#{lesson_short_cont}, LESSON_KIT=#{lesson_kit} WHERE LESSON_IDX=4
